releaseNotes: Please update the app in order to start enjoying the content!
- Fixed Search UI when no results are found (Image was pushed to header).
- Changed Genre and Country buttons UI to more minimalist to match the app UI.
- Fixed episodes WATCHING bug where clicking on one would also show watching on other.
- Fixed Favorites showing even after logging out.
- Added Notification Channel so users can toggle off/on from device settings easily.
- Fixed several bugs and took performance measures.
- Changed rewind and forward in player to 15 seconds.
